data_emp.name: Ed Doran Ph.D.
data_emp.title: Founder, technology leader, advisor, board member
data_emp.summary:
Ed is a technology leader and four time founder with a proven track record of taking new opportunities from whiteboard to shipping product for hundreds of millions of people across the world.

He began his career in market research and insight, expanded to management consulting, and ultimately to product and business leadership. He has experience leading in large and small organizations, local and global teams, complex partnerships, and founding new global scale products.

Ed sets the vision, builds the teams, and drives...

1. Identify the opportunity: Developing a deep understanding of consumers, competitors, and the technology landscape. Identifying the high value business opportunity based on the market conditions

2. Build the product: Delivering compelling experiences by bringing together business, engineering, and design across platforms.

3. Engage the market and ecosystem: Driving momentum for the experience, product, brand, and company through marketing (e.g., brand, positioning, messaging), business strategy, and strategic partnerships

Ed's teams integrate design, engineering, and business to create great products at a global scale.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
Ed is a powerhouse of product strategy. I worked with him from the earliest days of the Cortana initiative, and saw his leadership in action from the get go.
Ed starts from the Big Picture to establish a compelling vision (generating insights, championing research), but is also excellent at translating that vision into a roadmap of milestones that are achievable for a given product cycle. In the Cortana effort, Ed was the voice of differentiation and the champion of the end-user experience at every step.
I found Ed to be a willing and open collaborator: eager to share insights and to learn from/leverage the work of others.

I've had the pleasure of working with Ed twice. In each project, he knew exactly when to balance giving the team direction vs. asking for it, and was an open but knowledgeable collaborator who always sought first to understand the point of view being shared. I really appreciated his depth of knowledge but almost as much his patience; he can work through a thorny, unknown challenge with a team and remain not only focused on the problem, but on getting there calmly and as a team, and it show in the results. He's clearly an expert on mobile, and the ecosystems, services, products, and players that define the space, but his natural curiosity means that he is constantly exploring new insights into consumer behavior and the product/services implications that result. I'd welcome the chance to work with him again.

Ed is an entrepreneurial manager with a strong business sense and creativity. He has an innate ability to focus on the future while still firmly grounded in the present. Easy going and always professional, Ed is an effective collaborator internally as well as externally with partners.

Ed Doran, is a unique individual.  He has a blend of zen-like focus instilling a clam can do attitude around those, who work with him.  Yet he also manages to incite an amazing amount of excitement about the project.  I had the pleasure of working with Ed on Cortana integration.  I was always impressed with his ability to step back and see both companies view, and quickly ascertain a common ground suggestion that everyone could agree on.  

I look forward to working with Ed. again.

I really enjoy working with Ed. He is a great team builder, collaborator, and visionary. He is calm and deliberate and just the type of person you want on your team.  Smart, passionate, and consistent. I really appreciate the dedication he demonstrated on our projects.  I hope to keep working with him!

member_experience_collection.title: Mentor
member_experience_collection.description:
I serve as a mentor to VETT which was founded by leaders hailing from Columbia Journalism School, Dow Jones, and ABC News.

NYC Media Lab connects media and technology companies with New York City’s universities to drive innovation, entrepreneurship and talent development. A public-private partnership launched by the New York City Economic Development Corporation, NYC Media Lab funds projects and programs that foster collaboration across an array of disciplines and emerging technologies. The Combine, NYC Media Lab’s venture platform, helps companies connect to startups within the City's thriving technology ecosystem.

member_experience_collection.title: ELEVATE | Member (Inaugural Cohort)
member_experience_collection.description: The four-week program begins on June 4, 2019, and covers the three stages of the customer lifecycle: attract, engage, delight. During the final week, participants will complete a fundraising master class led by General Catalyst and portfolio founders. After completion of the accelerator program, US-based startups that are actively looking to raise capital will have the opportunity to pitch for investment funding at HubSpot’s annual INBOUND event, held on September 3, 2019, at the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center in Boston.

member_experience_collection.title: Mentor
member_experience_collection.description:
As a Mentor for Columbia Technology Ventures x IBM Blockchain Launch Accelerator, I work with the BitRights Team (Columbia MBA 19) at Columbia University to facilitate the transfer of research innovations from the lab to the market, as well as supporting start-up efforts.

Columbia Technology Ventures x IBM Blockchain Launch is a pre-seed accelerator for founders to explore their blockchain concepts and turn them into reality. The program, operated by Columbia’s Lab-to-Market Accelerator Network in partnership with IBM, is the 8th technology accelerator launched by Columbia University in the past 5 years. The 10-week program began on March 14th and will culminate with a demo day on May 17th.

I will support select teams in the future in partnership with Columbia Technology Ventures.

member_experience_collection.title: Founders Academy 2022 Member
member_experience_collection.description: The Google for Startups Founders Academy is a four-month, equity-free virtual program for pre-seed / seed stage startups across the US that is designed to help founders grow their revenues and obtain access to capital. Selected founders will participate in a series of cohort-based workshops and receive customized hands-on support across a wide range of topics including sales, product, strategy, and fundraising.

member_experience_collection.title: ITV Graduate Organization
member_experience_collection.description:
Atlanta Tech Village is America's 4th largest tech hub. The Village hosts a thriving ecosystem of innovation, powered by a 103,000 square foot building. Our mission is to support and inspire entrepreneurs to achieve success through a community that promotes faster connections between talent, ideas and capital.

In our first 5 years, our startups raised over $600M in capital and create more than 3600 jobs. We have Mentors, Advisors, partners, sponsors, investors, and more. Join our Accelerator program, Startup School, Pitch Event, or Friday lunch. We offer 500+ events a year catered to entrepreneurs'​ needs.

Over 300 startups call the Village home.

If you are changing the world through technology, you should be one of them.

member_experience_collection.title: Mentor + Demo Day Judge
member_experience_collection.description: LaunchX gives students the skills and mindset to start real companies.  Our signature summer program prepares high school students for real world success through entrepreneurship. We bring ambitious young entrepreneurs together from around the globe to build a startup on a team of peer founders. Students spend the intense weeks of the program working with industry experts and learning to solve problems in meaningful and viable ways.

member_experience_collection.title: Black Founders Exchange Member (7th Cohort)
member_experience_collection.description: In collaboration with Google for Startups, Black Founders Exchange is a curated program designed to move companies with a high-growth, scalable model from initial product to successfully raising seed capital with their business. Established in 2016, Black Founders Exchange — hosted by American Underground and Google for Startups — provides rich hands-on training, meaningful connections, and supportive community to help Black-led startups grow.

member_experience_collection.title: Accenture Black Founders Development Program 2022 Member Organization
member_experience_collection.description:
Accenture launched the Black Founders Development Program to help Black entrepreneurs advance and grow their technology businesses through greater, more direct access to venture capital, corporate mentorship, and strategic connections with Accenture’s business partners, clients, and people.

Led by Accenture Ventures, the new initiative will help improve Black communities’ ability to create wealth for those who previously did not have a seat at the table, as well as enable the next generation of innovation.

member_experience_collection.title: Semi-Finalist 2022
member_experience_collection.description: Black Ambition is working towards closing the opportunity and wealth gap through entrepreneurship. We invest capital and resources in high-growth startups founded by Black and Latinx HBCU students and entrepreneurs.

member_experience_collection.title: Founder in Residence @ MassChallenge x Leanstack Pilot
member_experience_collection.description:
MassChallenge is a non-profit that equips bold entrepreneurs with the resources and skills they need to disrupt the status quo and create meaningful global change – without taking anything in return.

LEANSTACK is a continuous innovation platform that helps companies systematically uncover and build what customers want.

member_publications_collection.title: Named #73 of 100 most Influential People in Influencer Marketing in 2018
member_publications_collection.description:
The total market size has been estimated between $1 and $2 billion this year alone, and growing to $5 to $10 billion within the next 5 years. These 100 individuals are transforming the industry. They are people you should listen to, connect with or just admire.

We looked at thousands of individuals. We considered several factors, including significant contributions each individual has made to the industry and the community. This encompasses not just followers and views, but also technical innovations, groundbreaking research and insights. We ended up with a healthy balance of those who work in the shadows and those who sit squarely in the spotlight.

This year’s list is an eclectic mix of Creators, CEO's, Talent Managers, Techies and Journalists - all of whom are intensely focused on driving influencer marketing forward. The outlook for influencer marketing looks bright in 2018.

data_emp.name: Embre Smith
data_emp.title: Director of Engineering at Walmart
data_emp.summary:
I love solving problems. It is extremely rewarding to work alongside others and identify and remove obstacles that stand in the way of progress. A career in supply chain has given me a steady supply of problems to solve and I've been blessed to work with incredible partners as we aim to unlock better.

My first professional experience in supply chain came with an Industrial Engineering internship at Ryder Logistics back in 2011. That experience lit the flame for me and opened my eyes to what a career in supply chain could offer. I spent seven years with Target Corporation, working in a number of site leadership and headquarters support roles as we built out Target's automated grocery supply chain. I joined Walmart in December 2018 as an Assistant General Manager of Walmart's first automated consolidation center in Colton, CA. Today, I am a Senior Site Engineer working to build out the Engineering arm of the Walmart Consolidation network.

Outside of work, I take every opportunity to get out in nature and explore the wonderful hiking trails in the mountains of southern California. These trips challenge me physically like my work challenges me intellectually. In both arenas, there are problems to be solved and challenges to be overcome, but a great reward to be gained in the struggle.

member_experience_collection.title: Lead Business Partner
member_experience_collection.description:
* Supported the opening of two highly automated food distribution centers in Ohio and California, providing training, consulting, and on-site support to the field teams

* Helped to train, assess, and coach Group Leaders at these two facilities

* Developed Best Practices for and supported the network Production Controllers as they made decisions regarding staffing, planning, and scheduling.

* Supported the initiative to implement same day receipt & ship in Target's food distribution centers

* Supported the development of network modeling for store realignments

* Helped develop and maintain the FDC network's Business Continuity Plan (emergency planning)

member_experience_collection.title: Group Leader
member_experience_collection.description:
* Food Distribution Center Operations Manager responsible for the warehousing and shipping of merchandise in a 350,000 square foot highly automated facility

* Responsible for the management of ~30 non-exempt direct reports

* Responsible for staffing decisions and the implementation of a number of process improvement initiatives

* Certified Executive Trainer responsible for the successful onboarding of new exempt Group Leaders and training of all new processes within the department

member_experience_collection.title: Group Leader
member_experience_collection.description:
* Food Distribution Center Operations Manager responsible for the warehousing and shipping of merchandise in a 400,000 square foot highly automated facility

* Responsible for the management of ~50 non-exempt direct reports

* Responsible for staffing decisions and the implementation of a number of process improvement initiatives

member_experience_collection.title: Industrial Engineering Intern
member_experience_collection.description:
* Completed a number of time studies which were then utilized during a number of process improvement initiatives

* Worked on a number of process improvement projects, including continued implementation of LEAN principles and staffing analysis

* Assisted in facility layout development using Value Stream Mapping and other strategic modeling tools

* Led an A3 group wherein we utilized past shipping data in order to better predict future order volumes. In the future, this forecast could be used to construct more efficient labor plans

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Group Leader
member_experience_collection.description: I am a Sr. Operations Manager in Target's Food Distribution Center in Rialto, CA. In this role, I lead a team of operations managers and warehouse workers as we service our Target stores and their guests with fresh grocery on a daily basis.

“Embre was a pivotal member of my Food Supply Chain team at Target.  The years we worked together were transformative for Target's perishable food distribution network.  During that time we designed, built and launched three highly automated Food Distribution Centers.  The capacity and capabilities from this expansion enabled Target's roll out of grocery into over 1600 stores.  Embre was a direct project manager involved in all details of two openings; West Jefferson Ohio and…

“Embre helped to open up Target’s state of the art Food Distribution Centers supported by Witron technology. He helped develop the processes for carton flow through the building. Embre had a great partnership with the Witron team to understand the automation, system controls, and reporting. He also trained the Target leadership team on the processes as Target opened these new buildings across the country. Once these buildings were up and running, he helped to further optimize processes to increase productivity and utilize the automation to its fullest potential. ”

“Embre was a pivotal member of my Food Supply Chain team at Target.  The years we worked together were transformative for Target's perishable food distribution network.  During that time we designed, built and launched three highly automated Food Distribution Centers.  The capacity and capabilities from this expansion enabled Target's roll out of grocery into over 1600 stores.  Embre was a direct project manager involved in all details of two openings; West Jefferson Ohio and Rialto CA.  Our automation partner for these facilities was Witron whom Embre worked with directly onsite, at their headquarters and through our headquarters location.  Both projects, while massive in scope came in on time and under budget.  This would not have been possible without Embre's balance of technical expertise and collaborative leadership.  Once the build was complete he transitioned to training and onboarding the leadership team that would run the daily operations of the facilities.  We were so impressed with his approach and skill set that we promoted him to a leadership position within the operation team at the Rialto facility.  ”

member_experience_collection.title: Technical Advisor, Global Digital Advertising
member_experience_collection.description:
- Chief of Staff/ Technical Advisor to Global VP of advertising sales at Amazon
- Responsible for sales strategy
- Responsible for day-to-day business management and strategic initiatives for growth and profitability

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Product Manager, Display Advertising
member_experience_collection.description:
eCommerce meets advertising meets machine learning and you have media that works, every single time, whether it's on the web, mobile, or tablet devices, or everywhere at once.

I build products. Areas include:

1. eCommerce advertising (embedding dynamic eCommerce features and functionality, such as Add to Cart, Coupons, Add to Wish List, into display ads)
2. Creative optimization (machine-learning based performance optimization)
3. Creative analytics (machine-learning based insights)
4. Experimentation platforms (A/B testing)
5. Rich media/ video advertising

Results:
1. Launched 18 advertising products in North America, Europe, and Asia in 2014
2. Grew eCommerce advertising revenue by 64% YoY
3. Latency-optimized ad creative to enhanced user experience
4. Launched the rich-media Display Advertising program
5. Launched the advertising insights and experimentation program

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Associate, Business Consulting
member_experience_collection.description:
Clients:
1. Boston Consulting Group: Built BCG's internal stock compensation platform
2. Norwegian Cruise Line: Built machine-learning based cruise booking system
3. Sea world Parks: Worked on the strategy team to deliver digital strategy for Sea world

-Sized opportunities within a given market for a client’s product or service offering.
- Performed market analysis on specified markets using relevant criteria and contributed to creation of multi-year, multi-program digital marketing and e-commerce strategy.
- Facilitated client workshops for mapping and documentation of complex business processes, identified areas for improvement, and recommended changes.
- Collaborated with technical, design, and business teams to recommend product features.
- Led product development and business analysis teams and created product development documents.

member_experience_collection.title: Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
- Worked with top-tier wireless service providers and Amdocs teams to deliver business and technology solutions related to billing, customer relationship management, and operations support systems.
- Conducted research, analyzed data, presented results, and delivered project proposals to clients.
- Prepared project and financial plans, monitored progress, and resolved risks and issues.
- Organized workshops with client stakeholders and focused on building long-term partnerships.
- Identified and captured key processes indicators, improvements, and opportunities.
- Identified and documented key business processes and associated workflows.

member_experience_collection.title: General Manager, Fire TV Content & Advertising
member_experience_collection.description:
•	Led a cross-functional organization (engineering, product, program management, and design) focused on increasing customer engagement and creating new monetization opportunities on Fire TV.
•	Created a vision for a free, ad-supported, over-the-top (OTT) video business for categories such as news, sports, music, and kids to provide better discovery, aggregation, and personalization to customers which would natively integrate content into the Fire TV platform, personalize to customers’ taste, and provide availability without requiring to log in/set up an account.
•	Developed proof-of-concept by building and launching an ad-supported, aggregated live and on-demand news experience across national (e.g., CBS, ABC), local, and digital native providers (e.g., Cheddar).

member_experience_collection.title: Head of Product and Engineering, Alexa Monetization
member_experience_collection.description:
•	Defined the developer-facing monetization strategy for Alexa, focused on new premium content, games, news, music, sounds/alarms.
•	Hired, developed and led a cross-functional team of engineers, product managers, software development managers, technical program managers, and UX designers to launch programs including:

-- In-skill purchasing: Enables voice-based transactions for digital subscriptions and one-time purchases for Alexa customers, and provides self-service publishing tools, SDKs, APIs, code samples, reporting analytics, dashboards, CX best practices, and automated payments for third-party and internal Amazon developers.
-- Alexa Developer Rewards: Pays developers of most popular skills based on customer engagement to acquire and retain top developers.

member_experience_collection.title: Technical Advisor to VP Sales/Marketing, Advertising
member_experience_collection.description:
•      Served as Technical Advisor to the Global VP of Advertising Sales and Marketing.
•	Drove strategic planning for the org including growth, product pricing, segmentation, and sales enablement.
•	Drove executive communication and quarterly, monthly, and weekly business reviews.

member_experience_collection.title: Product Leader, Advertising
member_experience_collection.description:
•       Led the development of products at the intersection of eCommerce, advertising, and machine learning, including Amazon's first native display advertising product.
•	Built the product strategy for "eCommerce ads" that allow users to take eCommerce actions directly from ad units, and provide rich transactional reporting (e.g., product sales) to advertisers to prove efficacy.
•	Collaborated with Amazon Retail teams (e.g., pricing, customer reviews) to deliver the ad experience and with Amazon Ads Sales to deliver self-serving buying tools for advertising agencies.
•	Developed machine learning-based auto-optimization to serve best performing eCommerce ad units to maximize advertiser objective (e.g., Return on Ad Spend) and created tools to analyze detailed performance data.
•	eCommerce ads became the key differentiator for Amazon's ads business and drive billions of dollars in revenue annually.

member_experience_collection.title: Co-founder, Director of Product Management, Amp
member_experience_collection.description:
Leading all things product for Amp.

Amp is a new live radio app from Amazon that gives creators the power to run the airwaves. Currently in beta, Amp’s mobile app gives anyone the tools to pick up the mic, create a playlist, and DJ their own live radio show.

Sizzle reel: https://youtu.be/6FX2DKBjw0U
Blog: https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/entertainment/run-the-airwaves-with-amp-the-live-radio-app-from-amazon

member_experience_collection.title: Co-founder, Director of Product Management, Amp @Amazon
member_experience_collection.description:
Created the vision for Amp and lead all things product for it including mobile app and voice experiences for listeners, creator experiences for radio DJs, personalization, monetization, growth and expansion, content moderation, business tools, user community, and music licensing technology.

Amp is a new live radio app from Amazon that gives creators the power to run the airwaves. Amp’s mobile app gives anyone the tools to pick up the mic, create a playlist, and DJ their own live radio show.

Sizzle reel: https://youtu.be/6FX2DKBjw0U

member_experience_collection.title: General Manager, Fire TV Content & Advertising
member_experience_collection.description: As the GM for Fire TV Content and Advertising, created a vision for a free, ad-supported, over-the-top (OTT) video business for categories such as news, sports, music, and kids to provide better discovery, aggregation, and personalization -- thus increasing customer engagement and creating new monetization opportunities on Fire TV. Executed on the vision by hiring a cross-functional organization (engineering, product, program management, design, quality, data science) and launched the first product as the News app on Fire TV, providing aggregated live and on-demand news experience across national (e.g., CBS, ABC), local, and digital native providers (e.g., Cheddar).

member_experience_collection.title: Head of Product and Engineering, Alexa Monetization
member_experience_collection.description: As the Single-Threaded Leader for Alexa Skills Store, defined the developer-facing monetization strategy for Alexa, focused on new premium content, games, news, music, sounds/alarms, 3P integrations for the Alexa Voice Service, and presented the strategy to Jeff Bezos for approval. Executed on the strategy by building a cross-functional team (80+) of engineers, product managers, software development managers, technical program managers, and UX designers. Successfully launched and operationally managed many new programs including In-Skill Purchasing for voice-based purchase and delivery of digital goods.

member_experience_collection.title: Technical Advisor to VP Sales and Marketing, Advertising
member_experience_collection.description: Served as Technical Advisor (also known as Chief of Staff or Executive Shadow) to the Global VP of Advertising Sales and Marketing. Provided strategic insight and recommendations to support decision-making for P&L and improve speed of innovation and employee experience for an organization of 1K+ employees. Drove strategic planning including for business growth, product pricing, segmentation, and sales enablement. Delivered strategy and financial updates for Amazon S-Team.

member_experience_collection.title: Product Leader, Advertising
member_experience_collection.description: As the Product Leader for the Amazon Ads org, built Amazon's first native Display Ads product: "eCommerce ads" that allow users to take eCommerce actions directly from ad units, and provide rich transactional reporting (e.g., product sales) to advertisers to prove efficacy. Collaborated with Amazon Retail teams (e.g., pricing, customer reviews) to deliver the ad experience and with Amazon Ads Sales to deliver self-serving buying tools for advertising agencies. Developed machine learning-based auto-optimization to serve best performing eCommerce ad units to maximize advertiser objective (e.g., Return on Ad Spend) and created tools to analyze detailed performance data. eCommerce ads became the key differentiator for Amazon's ads business and drive billions of dollars in revenue annually.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation: Deepak has a very thoughtful approach to projects, leading to clear and confident solutions. He led the Business Analytics track on a very large project managing both client expectations and internal work flow. He is extremely easy to work with and desired candidate for any project team.

Deepak was the Senior Business Analyst/Lead BA when I was at SapientNitro for a brief contract. When I joined, the project was in full swing; I found that Deepak was quite knowledgeable about the needs of the clients for whom we were designing the product – that was extremely helpful. His analytical skills are among the best I've seen. He is able to think creatively and find innovative and unconventional methods to resolve complex issues and explain complicated scenarios with ease. Besides being reasonable, incredibly patient, a great listener as well as communicator, and skilled at various methods of effective requirements elicitation, he was equally as talented in creating an environment that was stress free – even when there were pre-defined deliverables and hard deadlines. It was a great pleasure working with him!

data_emp.name: Antonia Burridge
data_emp.title: Co-Founder of PwC Raise | Ventures; PwC Deals Director; Board Advisor; Start-Up / Scale-Up Advisor; Timewise Power 50, Co-Founder of Koala & Joe
data_emp.summary:
As a co-founder of PwC Raise | Ventures, I want to help make the fundraising process for companies as smooth and efficient as possible.

Chartered accountant with over 10 years experience in Deals and a real passion to support Start-Up and Scale-Up businesses along their growth journey.

I have a real love of good food (having worked as a chef) and outdoor boot camps and am a mother to two small children.

Recently listed as a Winner of the 2020 Timewise Power 50 Award.

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Manager
member_experience_collection.description:
I qualified as a Chartered Accountant in 2007 and have been in the Financial Decisions & Analysis Group within Transaction Services since 2008. I work with both Private Equity houses and Corporates during and after the deal phase. During the deal I help to build financial and operational models to support an acquisition, a disposal or a refinancing. Post deal I work on building and embedding strategic plans, budgets, short and medium term cash flows and working capital forecasts. I also support clients who need to quantify the impact of an adhoc decision. This has included:
o Developing and implementing board reporting for an international women's fashion retailer across multiple brands.

o Helping a global retail chain to secure its refinancing by developing its forecasting process to understand the impact of international expansion.

o Developing a medium term cash flow forecasting tool for a billion pound retail business to support a supplier renegotiation project.

o Building the medium term business plan to support a large private equity backed clothing retailer through its refinancing, reviewing the impact of timings and location choices of store roll-out.

o Developing an investment appraisal tool to support the global expansion and investment strategy for a large coffee chain.

o Working with an international leisure business to help support its potential acquisition of a portfolio of hotels.

o Developing the working capital forecasting for a leading online leisure retailer, establishing a process within the UK and rolling it out across seven European countries.

o The operational and financial business plan for a major car part distributor to help them create and critically evaluate its business strategy for the next five years.

member_experience_collection.description: Founding member of RAISE - helping scale-ups raise funds by getting them investor ready and connecting them to providers of finance.

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Manager - Transaction Services - Financial Decisions & Analysis
member_experience_collection.description:
A modelling and analytics business dedicated to helping clients make better decisions by combining commercial, technology, data and finance skills both during and post deal.

Responsibilities
• Helped clients (Private Equity Portfolio companies and corporates) during and post deal by providing insight and transparency over business performance. This included helping to improve their Board Reporting, Forecasting and Planning and Cash and Liquidity management, for example:
• Helping to design and implement the strategic planning and short term cashflow forecasting tools for a large UK retailer with more than 350 stores in the UK.
• Developing the Board Reporting for a group of fashion brands with more than 1,250 stores worldwide. Worked across the finance, merchandising and commercial teams to develop and embed a smooth and efficient process.
• Modelling to support the financial structuring and planning of deals.
• Completed the UK Emerging Leaders programme –a two year selective leadership programme for the highest performing mangers.
• Actively involved in the recruitment, training and coaching of new staff.
• Helped drive the growth of the business through developing existing opportunities and sourcing new clients.

member_experience_collection.title: PwC - Audit
member_experience_collection.description:
Audited a range of FTSE 100 and FTSE 250 clients, focusing on the food industry. Managed staff on smaller assignments and managed areas on larger assignments including corporate governance, directors’ remuneration and notes to the financial statements.
•Selected for six-month innovation programme to drive improvements in the business.

data_emp.name: Beau Wyatt
data_emp.title: Innovation Europe at Accenture | New Ventures & Startups 🚀 | Founder @YourGo
data_emp.summary:
Hi, I'm Beau - I work at Accenture within their European Innovation team 💡 building New Ventures for corporations and fostering a network of Start-Ups that are breaking convention for our clients.

I joined Accenture Strategy in 2014 where I worked on business growth projects for global businesses and then took some time out to complete my MBA at London Business School finishing in May 2020.

Since then, I have worked with the UKI Accenture Ventures team and I am currently building a new offering called Venturing as a Service within the European Innovation Network.

Anyway - here I am now engaging with the most inspiring, creative and intelligent people in the world.

I am also trying to do my bit to give back to the community, even if it moves the needle a tiny bit, by...

✍🏻 Posting & Writing on LinkedIn on Venturing, Entrepreneurship, Sustainability and Education
🎙️  Speaking on Panels when opportunities come up on topics listed above
🌐 Building a community for early stage founders, startups, and entrepreneurs

Look forward to engaging with you 😊

member_experience_collection.title: Strategy Analyst
member_experience_collection.description:
As a Strategy Analyst, I am currently part of the Digital Finance consulting team working to deliver Strategic financial solutions, core to the CFO agenda. I have delivered solutions to clients and developed skills in:

- Building and integrating financial reports with Oracle databases
- Creating financial forecasts and budgets
- Financial Modelling of P&L Savings and Investments
- Cost Reduction: Supply Chain Optimisation

Equally, I work alongside the Financial Strategy team with a vision to be the leading strategic consultant, partnering with CFOs to create value in a digital environment. Areas of focus involve solving solutions for financial firms in:

- Increasing regulatory and reporting demands - (Finance, Risk, Regulatory, Treasury etc)
- Continued cost pressure - Integrated operating models (e.g. ZBB)
- Increasing business reporting and analytics demands - (Digital finance, advanced analytics etc.)

Current Certifications:

Oracle Hyperion Planning 11 Certified Implementation Specialist

Oracle Hyperion Planning 11.1.2 PreSales Specialist

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
Since Beau's has been at Accenture, he has quickly proved to be knowledgeable and continually sets the bar high with his quality of work. He is popular among the Clients he works with, and creates strong working relationships which are invaluable to the Projects ongoing.
Beau when not working on Client Projects, demonstrates continued growth and pro activeness partaking in all training available to him on new Hyperion products,this is a testament to his hard working attitude and value to the team.
I am certain his ability to take responsibility, hard working attitude and continued growth in Hyperion Software will be significant in his future career.
I would gladly work with Beau on any project, he is an asset to any team.

I would recommend Beau and his personable yet completely focussed attitude to business and am convinced he will succeed in his chosen line of business.

member_experience_collection.title: Founder & CEO
member_experience_collection.description:
IMDb is the world's most popular and authoritative source for information on movies, TV shows and celebrities. Products and services to help fans decide what to watch and where to watch it include: the IMDb website for desktop and mobile devices; apps for iOS and Android; and X-Ray on Prime Video.

IMDb also offers a free streaming channel, IMDb TV, and produces IMDb original video series and podcasts. For entertainment industry professionals, IMDb provides IMDbPro and Box Office Mojo.

IMDb licenses information from its vast and authoritative database to third-party businesses worldwide; learn more at developer.imdb.com. IMDb is an Amazon company. For more information, visit https://www.imdb.com/press and follow @IMDb.

data_emp.name: Pravin Deshpande
data_emp.title: Co-Founder and Director at The Consulting Partners
data_emp.summary:
Pravin brings on-board 33 years of global experience across various domains, processes , geographies and technologies.

As a Co Founder and Executive Director of TCP, he offers his deep domain and technical expertise to his customers, spread across US, Europe, Middle East , South East Asia, Japan and India

Formerly, a Vice President and a Global Head of an IT organization ( Tech Mahindra ) ; Pravin holds vast experience in the field of SAP domain, business process consulting, management consulting, training , marketing and branding.

While working in leadership positions with global IT service providers like Wipro, NTT Docomo (USA) ( Intelligroup), Tech Mahindra and Tata Technologies; he rendered his services to many global organizations like GE, Toyota, Bristol-Myers Squibb, Sony, Saudi Aramco, Nestle, Sanyo and so on.

His professional exposure spans across many countries like USA, Germany, Switzerland, Singapore, Indonesia, Japan, India, and Saudi Arabia

Evangelist in the field of Technical Training & Skill Management , he designed and delivered numerous business process models, tools and solutions , which allowed businesses to complete IT projects in a productive manner globally. He has won many awards for his contribution in the field of training and skill management by SAP AG, Wipro and Tech Mahindra.

Trained and certified in Program Management skills , he has architected and delivered numerous Business Transformation projects in large and complex business environment across the globe.

Graduated from Indian Institution of Industrial Engineering as well as professionally trained by University of Michigan for global leadership, Pravin is an expert consultant and acknowledged professional in the field of Supply Chain Management, Business Process Consulting, Industrial Engineering and Productivity consulting, Manufacturing process consulting and Inventory Management.

Based in city of Pune in India, he travels across the globe to offer and deliver value-added IT services to his customers

member_experience_collection.title: Marketing Manager / Team Lead - Enterprise Mobile Devices & Services
member_experience_collection.description:
Member of the Enterprise Business Team, responsible for B2B marketing, campaigns, sales activities, strategic partnerships, and building differentiated enterprise offerings for mobile devices and security service offerings. Held a number of roles, including:

MOBILE B2B DEMAND GEN LEAD (2016):
- Team lead responsible for enterprise product marketing strategy, positioning, messaging, value prop development, segmentation, and targeting.
- Coordination of integrated campaign strategy including $5M quarterly B2B marketing and ATL spend driving 20M monthly impressions and 700k engagements
- Responsible for marketing-driven pipeline contribution of $73m in sales qualified leads

HEAD OF B2B DIGITAL MARKETING & CAMPAIGNS (2015):
- Team leader responsible for all B2B online properties, digital & print media, and global events
- New product launch messaging, value proposition creation, positioning, event coordination, keynote support
- $5M marketing budget and cross team leadership

B2B SALES ENABLEMENT (2014):
- Central point of contact for 27 Global Fortune 500 accounts in North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia
- Individually contributed to 42% of team device sales goal (over 200k units), and 48% of team revenue commitments ($70+M)
- Expanded engaged set of customers by 150% in nine months
- Facilitated multiple business development projects including testing of new business models,cross-industry sales and financing pilots
- Supported global network of key account managers through development of collateral, targeting guidance, messaging strategy, communications support

CHANNEL PARTNER DEVELOPMENT (2013):
- Managed top global distributor and carrier relationships promoting sell-to, sell-through, and sell-with activities
- Authored and proposed new business model and strategic partnerships with multiple Fortune 100 businesses
- Integrated multi-product solution and promotional campaign for reseller partners

member_experience_collection.title: MBA Candidate
member_experience_collection.description:
Graduated 1st Class Honours, Awarded "Director's List" distinction (top 10% of class).
Completed in-depth studies in economics, corporate finance, and management with two consulting projects in high tech industry.

LEADERSHIP & ACTIVITIES:
- Communications Officer for the Cambridge Business School Club, helping to connect 150 MBAs and 50 MFins with the University, sports, social, and professional opportunites.
- Coach and Rower of Darwin College Boat Club - compete on competitive crew, coach and cox women's team.
- Cambridge University Cycling Club - assist in leading group training and competition

member_experience_collection.title: Data Analyst, Policy Team
member_experience_collection.description:
Led a consulting team effort with the Google London New Business Development team and Google Berlin Policy team to create economic models to predict creative industry value in the short and mid term.

MARKET MODELING & FORECASTING:
- Performed extensive research into the music, film, and TV industries in three different geographies (USA, UK, and Germany) to identify key drivers which influence the growth of digital revenues.
- Produced comprehensive models detailing the revenue splits for the UK and German film and TV markets through 2015.
- Performed regressions, simulations, quant/qual interviews, and analysis to influence key policy efforts in Europe

member_experience_collection.title: Marketing Manager / Country Lead, Cloud Computing
member_experience_collection.description:
Team lead for Cloud Services for the education sector at Microsoft's UK Subsidiary.
Responsible for delivering the regional email growth metric for the UK Subsidiary, including sales of Exchange, Live@edu, and Office 365 for Education.

SALES & MARKETING MANAGEMENT:
- Grew education services business by 126% in FY12, elevating subsidiary from #6 to #2 worldwide.
- Secured $1B annual investment for Education through business case development and strategic competitor analysis
- Received prestigious “ShareFighter” team award from country GM

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT
- Identified underserved market segment and initiated an 18 month, £150k initiative to capture 66% market share
- Won largest Government cloud contract (1.2 million users) acting as representative to Scottish Government, leading bid team, authoring official procurement documentation, and beating the highly-favored incumbent competitor

PEOPLE MANAGEMENT:
- Managed team of specialists, and independently responsible for an annual marketing budget of £250k
- Managed deployments and highly specialized customers of over 500,000 users

member_experience_collection.title: Product / Channel Marketing Manager
member_experience_collection.description:
Decorated performance record and highly accelerated promotion path at Microsoft’s global headquarters and North America subsidiary.

CLOUD CHANNEL DEVELOPMENT: OFFICE 365 (2008-2010)
- Developed partner onboarding & activation programs, content, frameworks, and contracts for Microsoft’ first ever cloud services business
- Grew partner network from 0 to 20,000 in 24 months
- Created global evidence engine including 50 case studies, videos, and PR releases.
- Built and maintained two top global websites (1.8M visitors/month), five monthly newsletters (100k distribution), and partner email communications/marketing
- Led content/keynotes/delivery of Worldwide Partner Conference event for 2008, 2009, 2010 (average 15k attendees/year).
- Delivered 100+ global events including tech roadshows, advisory councils, and personally recorded studio training sessions

member_projects_collection.name: Microsoft Online Services Partner Enablement
member_projects_collection.description:
Microsoft reached a milestone in Cloud computing when it commercially released its Online productivity software to 19 countries around the world. With a sales motion supported almost exclusively through a partner channel, this global audience of 600,000 needed to be enrolled, trained, and activated on a new product, new model, and new way of business that would change the channel dynamic.

I was tasked with developing and implementing a mechanism to support this global community.

The result was a comprehensive onboarding and communications program which allowed partners to rapidly enroll and stay up-to-date on the latest service updates, programmatic changes, and promotions.
The program, called Quickstart, accelerated the Microsoft partner community adoption, provided lifecycle partner support, and created the authority for future Microsoft Online Services to onboard effortlessly. Quickstart quickly became the authority for communicating and interacting with partners in this new world of Cloud services.


The Quickstart program quickly grew to become one of the top ranking product pages on the Microsoft Partner Network. With an average monthly user growth rate of 40%, Quickstart successfully onboarded and trained thousands of partners in its first months without the aid of direct marketing dollars.
• The average Quickstart user visits 7x per month and spends an average of 19:00 minutes in the site
• Content downloads have grown 360% from the previous year, and enrolment has increased 259%
• 100% of specialized go-to (‘Accelerate’) partners have taken training through Quickstart
• Quickstart currently delivers the 2nd highest total partner trainings (behind flagship Microsoft Office)
• The ROMI for the Quickstart website is 8.8, calculated by Quickstart partner deals beginning in year 2

This project was recognised by the IT Services Marketing Association with a gold "Marketing Excellence Award" in Sales Enablement in 2010.

member_projects_collection.name: Cambridge Venture Project - Cloud Marketplace Analysis
member_projects_collection.description: Assisted cloud computing startup size and assess marketplace potential for expansion of their already successful content delivery network (CDN). Defined key marketplace success attributes from historical and current marketplaces, performed detailed competitor analysis, and provided viable emerging country options for business expansion.
member_projects_collection.team_members: Damon Sununtnasuk, Nawaz Imam, CFA, Angélique Peigné, Pablo Blancas, Li Wei

member_projects_collection.name: Google Monetization of Creative Industries
member_projects_collection.description: Worked with the Google London New Business Development team and Google Berlin Policy team to create economic models to predict creative industry value in the short and mid term. Extensive research into the music, film, and TV industries in three different geographies (USA, UK, and Germany) identified key drivers which influence the growth of digital revenues. The project produced comprehensive models detailing the revenue splits for the UK and German film and TV markets through 2015. Insights will be used by the policy team to guide key discussions with policy makers in Europe.

I had the opportunity to manage Damon in his first position with Microsoft. Although he was then still in college, he demonstrated an impressive ability to understand complex situations that might have challenged others with years of experience. He showed a remarkable ability to learn quickly and showed great focus in pursuing the project goals. He brings a lot of energy to everything he does and brings an infectious, positive spirit that made him both effective and respected on the team. Overall, I came away surprised and impressed at how much he was able to accomplish in a short time, and at his ability to work effectively alongside a wide range of personality types. It would be a pleasure for me to work with Damon again in any capacity.

I had the opportunity to work with Damon as part of Samsung’s Enterprise Business Team. 

This was a time of great change within the organization, as it moved along the stages of the enterprise maturation path. As a result, Damon was asked to take on a variety of different responsibilities within a short amount of time. 

Regardless of the business directives, Damon was able to constantly adapt, learn quickly and then begin to engage in the task at hand. Damon was successful in the role because of his diverse, yet deep set of business skills. Damon was continually put to the test in high stress situations. Damon was able to handle these situations with ease and drive the business forward. 

Damon is very goal oriented and diligent at advancing key initiatives. He can take ambiguous direction and turn it into actionable strategy. Further, he is an efficient worker who is able to coordinate complex groups of stakeholders across multiple geographies. All skills which are paramount to leaders in today’s workplace.

It would be a pleasure for me to work with Damon again in any capacity.”

“"Damon Sununtasuk is one of the most impressive young persons I've ever met: bright, courteous, well spoken, informed and always helpful. In 2002, along with a partner, I was looking to develop a computer application which would assist visually challenged users. My partner and I were both involved with other business activities, and wanted someone to spearhead our efforts to bring our product to market. We had interviewed several candidates, when Damon asked if we might consider him. Although initially taken aback, on reflection I decided Damon would be an ideal leader for our small software endeavor and convinced my partner of the wisdom of this choice. Damon performed exceptionally well. He took complete control of the corporation which we formed, filing necessary paperwork, contracting with software developers and handling all of the finances.

Damon has made conscious decisions to excel. Damon is who he is because he carefully chose his path and worked extraordinarily hard at achieving his goals. He has consistently exercised discipline, determination and distinction in his actions, both academic and personal. It is by dint of his demeanor, his intelligence, and his ability that he has risen to the level he has attained at Microsoft. It was his demeanor, his intelligence and his ability that led my partner and me to hire him to lead our corporation. This central fact of his being – his self determination – cannot be overstated. If any employer wants to evaluate him, they need look no farther than his character.”

“I worked with Damon as a service provider for many years. In his marketing role at Microsoft he demonstrated exceptional talent in understanding the needs of the audience and was very good at creating the value proposition by segment. While delivering core content and digital marketing Damon worked across multiple deliverables and projects with exceptional ease and maintained full context with clarity and depth. He also has an amazing personality and fun to work with. He is a high energy marketer with a strong commitment to quality work in a short time.”

"I had the privelege of managing Damon during his tenure as the US IW Technical Audience Lead. During this time I was able to see Damon naturally evolve his knowlede of and impact on the business by being a relentlessly curious and action oriented driver. Working in a highly matrixed organization, Damon was often faced with roadblocks and barriers to driving his buiness. Damon’s ability to scope and quantify the the problem and opportunity served him well to convince others and get others to aligned to his vision. Damon was able to do all of this with a positive and friendly attitude and highly colaborative working style. Damon was a pleasure to have on my team and I would not hesitate to hire Damon again where these qualities are needed and valued."

“Damon is one of the most motivated and enterprising people I have ever met. I worked with Damon for over 3 years and during that time, I was constantly impressed by his capacity to drive business impact on everything he tackled. His drive for excellence is unparalleled. I welcome the chance to work with Damon again in the future.”

“I have always really enjoyed  working with Damon - both professionally and on a personal level. Damon has the right balance of "can-do attitude", entreprenurship and effectiveness, and at the same time, he understand how to work and navigate in a large organization like Microsoft. He has a good business sense, he get things done and I would love to hire him one day.”

“Damon is an incredibly dedicated and motivating line manager who has never failed to support me. Our team, along with his focus and strategy, has successfully taken Microsoft Live@edu to new heights in the UK, and has helped forge best practices that have a global reach across Microsoft.

If I had to use three words to describe working with Damon they would be: fun, fair, and empowering.”

data_emp.name: Glen Waters
data_emp.title: Founder and Head of PwC Raise; Director - M&A Transaction Services at PwC; Non-Exec Director; Board Advisor
data_emp.summary:
Entrepreneurial chartered accountant with a broad range of skills, including helping early stage businesses raise funding & scale-up, assisting companies through a M&A deal process with a specialism in financial due diligence, as well as significant experience of acting as a CFO, Non-executive Director and Board Advisor.

If you want to sit down for a coffee or a chat feel, free to send me a message.

member_experience_collection.title: Director - M&A Transaction Services
member_experience_collection.description: Managing buy-side and sell-side due diligence assignments for entrepreneurial owner managed businesses, private equity and corporate clients specialising in the mid-tier deal space (transactions typically £5m-£250m) across a variety of sectors; TMT (including broadcast media, B2B publishing, software and directories), business services and retail. Experience of over 50 transactions both in the UK and internationally.

data_emp.name: Dr. Frederik G. Pferdt
data_emp.title: Google's First and Former Chief Innovation Evangelist & Adjunct Professor, Stanford University
data_emp.summary:
My mission is to grow an innovation mindset in everyone and I believe creativity exists in all of us.

As Google's first-ever Chief Innovation Evangelist, I initiated a radically diverse community of over 500 Innovation Evangelists, trained thousands of Googlers and co-founded Google's The Garage while creating its first Innovation Laboratory. I helped leaders and teams across Alphabet/Google and beyond to discover and solve problems in new, unconventional ways, shaping one of the world's most fabled innovation cultures.

As an Adjunct Professor at Stanford University’s Hasso Plattner Institute of Design (aka: d.school), I teach graduate courses like: “Hacking your Innovation Mindset” and feel lucky to empower students through design so that they can invent cool things that matter in the world.

Featured as the "Pope of Creativity" and "Dr. Innovation" in over two hundred international newspapers, magazines and documentaries like FastCompany, Inc. Magazine, Times Magazine, Harvard Business Manager, WirtschaftsWoche, El Tiempo, Business Today, FAZ, Asia Business Daily, Der Spiegel, Financial Times, Capital, Manager Magazine, brandeins, Sueddeutsche Zeitung, Chosun Ilbo, The Telegraph, Arte TV, VOX TV and ARD.

Together with my wonderful wife, we support our next generation of inventors as the founders of our children's charity and maker space: “Tüftelei”, where children use their human superpower to imagine and learn with their minds, hands and hearts.

Finding inspiration in the playfulness and explorer mindset of my three children, you'll find me regularly evangelizing how people can grow their mind to invent what's next around the world and from my GeoDesic Dome above Silicon Valley.

member_experience_collection.title: Global Tax Systems and Processes Manager
Central Tax Engine - Finance Owner
member_experience_collection.description:
Coordinating global tax content and configuration validation within the CTE. Responsible for:

Developing a global roadmap for deployment, balancing alignment with business and compliance initiatives;

Identifying opportunities for continued design and performance improvement utilizing best practices;

Defining SLA expectations and monitoring activities to ensure compliance; and,

Participating in project deployments to provide oversight and guidance complying with global design expectations.

member_experience_collection.title: Manager of Transaction Tax Technology
member_experience_collection.description:
Responsible for supporting, maintaining and streamlining transaction tax systems and processes.

Manage Sabrix integration for phased rollout of SAP nationwide. Conduct change management sessions with field and training on new tax related processes.

Provide production support, troubleshooting and testing for Sabrix/SAP integration.

Streamlined Sabrix configurations to minimize ongoing maintenance efforts.

Manage exemption certificate processing, including transition to hosted solution and field training.

Developed monthly sales and use tax compliance and reconciliation processes.

Developing sales and use tax audit reports in conjunction with the IT organization to increase effectiveness and efficiencies.

Manage property tax data gathering from all U.S. branches on multiple systems. Implement check writing processes by 3rd party consultants.

Manage hardware and security needs for the U.S. Tax Department.

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Transaction Tax Systems
member_experience_collection.description:
Responsible for providing day to day support and maintenance of corporate tax systems.

Integrated Sabrix with SAP billing modules to ensure compliance with existing customer contracts and continue tax savings benefits to end customers.

Assisted with the design, development and testing of the Tax General Ledger in SAP, including tax compliance reports to achieve accurate and efficient tax returns.

Provided technical support, troubleshooting and documentation for 3 transaction tax engines in production environment - Vertex Q Series integrated with SAP, Sabrix integrated with SAP and a custom application integrated with custom mainframe billing and purchasing systems.

Provided database management and technical support for transaction tax and IRS audit teams.

Provided tax technical support to client facing EDS personnel.

Acted as liaison between the tax department and IT support managing functionality requirements and technical solutions.

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
Responsible for supervision and project management of Automated Compliance and Maintenance projects.

Supervised project integrating Vertex Quantum™ software with Peoplesoft billing system.

Developed and conducted training program for the Vertex Sales Tax Compliance System, Quantum for Sales and Use Tax Decision Maker and Quantum for Sales and Use Tax Returns.

member_experience_collection.title: Senior Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
Responsible for supervision and quality assurance of Process and Technology projects nationwide.

Supervised projects involving the integration of Vertex Quantum™ software.

Assisted in the marketing process, including proposal and budget preparation for target clients.

Performed analyses of current sales and use tax processes and provided recommendations to further enhance process efficiency and accuracy.

Integrated and optimized existing integrations of Vertex Quantum™ with SAP billing systems.

Provided extensive training services to staff and clients on Vertex Quantum™ software and transaction tax processes.

member_experience_collection.title: Consultant
member_experience_collection.description:
Responsible for managing various sales and use tax audits for multiple jurisdictions.

Collected and prepared necessary documentation for sales and use tax audits, including invoices, exemption certificates and refund request forms.

Performed extensive multi-state sales and use tax research to support audit defense.

Provided client services to negotiate and reduce audit assessments and support refund claims with state representatives from multiple jurisdictions.

member_experience_collection.title: Product Lead - Last Mile Delivery
member_experience_collection.description:
The Last Mile team within Ford Smart Mobility is leading the way in researching hardware and software solutions to solve last mile goods and service delivery problems.

Our innovation work builds on the success of the MoDe:Pro eBike and the Handle on Mobility experiment, covering research topics ranging from e-bikes and micro-mobility through to autonomous vehicles and digital algorithms.

Our aim is that by improving the capability and performance of logistics operators in the city of tomorrow we will improve the lives of customers, drivers, riders, operators and other city stakeholders.

member_experience_collection.title: Product Owner - Last Mile Delivery
member_experience_collection.description:
The Last Mile Delivery team within Ford Mobility is leading the way in researching hardware and software solutions to solve last mile goods and service delivery problems. Our innovation work builds on the success of the MoDe:Pro eBike and the Handle on Mobility experiment, covering research topics ranging from e-bikes and micro-mobility through to autonomous vehicles and digital algorithms.

Our MoDe:Link software product is a cloud-based software solution that helps delivery companies organise their operations and coordinate their drivers to meet a local cyclist or pedestrian - breaking the journey of parcels into multiple modes. The delivery van can then be used as a dynamic delivery hub where couriers collect parcels to deliver in the local area.

The project delivers an operational model that has the potential to reduce city congestion, improve air quality and drive up productivity of delivery vans. A solution that ensures citizens get their deliveries in a sustainable manner, improves city environments and enables higher operational efficiency for delivery companies.

member_experience_collection.title: Founder and Head of Product - Ford Last Mile Delivery
member_experience_collection.description:
The Ford Last Mile Delivery venture is a fast-growing business within the Ford Mobility organisation. Based at offices in Stratford, London the venture is transforming parcel delivery services with a logistics software product that facilitates multimodal delivery - the transfer of parcels from vans to street porters and cargo cycles for a greener final mile delivery. 

Since its formation as a small and nimble start-up the team has grown steadily, successfully pivoting and refining its proposition and business model. We are passionate about solving difficult problems in last mile logistics and building sustainable solutions that deliver lasting value for our customers and stakeholders. We thrive on working with great people to do meaningful work.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
“I have had the pleasure of working with and partnership with Amit Kapoor on many large, complex and strategic projects, here at Walmart.  These required months of thoughtful planning and execution to pull together a large group of impacted stakeholders and deploy a successful program.  

Amit leads with integrity, brings a wealth of experience, dedication, and fun to the team no matter who he is working with.  He dove right in to the Walmart environment and culture during his tenure with us and did so with drive, dedication, patience and flexibility.  I am proud to call  him a colleague and friend.  He works tirelessly to accomplish goals and does so by motivating and leading by example.  He has very strong interpersonal skills along with a very organized approach to his methods for delivering challenging projects.  I would highly recommend him for any organization that requires a positive role model and would be delighted to work with him again.  
”

“Amit is a wonderful leader and team member. I thoroughly enjoyed my time managing/working with Amit and would HIGHLY recommend him. Amit can do anything! He has extensive knowledge as a Human Capital consultant. Amit does a wonderful job building strong client relationships and managing up, down, and across the team. He's incredibly empathetic and caring so people enjoy working with him. At the same time, he is strong with project management so he's able to complete projects/deliverables in-scope, on-time, and in-budget. Amit is a self-starter and works to hone his craft. He's constantly looking for opportunities to enhance his skills in learning development and change management. I would love for an opportunity to work with Amit again! ”

“I had the pleasure of working with Amit over several years and several projects across Finance and HR technology deployments.  If given the opportunity I would happily work with him again in the future.  Amit has an impressive ability to be both strategic and tactical.  He is a strong team leader but also a strong partner and individual contributor.  His has a solid work ethic and a positive outlook that lifts the team up in morale and quality of work delivered.  I would give Amit my highest recommendation.  ”

“Amit Kapoor was an exceptional colleague, one who was always on top of his game and anxious to get involved in projects that were cutting edge for the company. Additionally Amit was a kind and caring leader who was always there for his team. I highly recommend Amit and I know he will be successful at whatever he tackles in life.  ”

data_emp.name: Robert Smith
data_emp.title: Founder & Chief Growth Officer - Pathway Signal Management at IBM
data_emp.summary:
Rob has worked in the Healthcare Information Technology industry for over fifteen years, gaining experience in the unique culture that is the NHS, whilst mastering disciplines such as; go to market planning and execution, business development and managing complex sales.

Rob specialises in using data and evidence to create and craft repeatable tailored value propositions that lead to long term successful business benefits for clients

As a seasoned market and business development executive he is passionate about advancing digital health technologies that deliver a measurable outcome to the people who need it the most, the patient.  Rob has an impressive and extensive history in taking existing offerings and packaging them  in a “first of a kind” way that accelerates market adoption and therefore revenue and net income growth:-

Within the Healthcare direct sales team at EMC Corporation, Rob successfully achieved a CGAR of 34% in billable product and services revenues over 3 years.

Within the content management healthcare sales team at Lexmark (now Hyland), Rob successfully achieved a CGAR of 60 % in billable product and services revenues over 2 years

For IBM Watson Health, Rob secured the first multi product Enterprise Imaging client in Europe and maintains thought leadership on industry and competitive challenges, and now leads the shaping of IBM to to stay ahead of and engage with potential healthcare buyers who wish to adopt and benefit from Smarter Pathways.

Prior to a career change in 2005, Rob worked within Investment Banking IT for over ten years.  His time in this industry culminated in Rob implementing the first shared infrastructure platform for all mid range systems at HSBC Bank PLC.  This transformation also required the introduction of new operating models, including implementing “on-demand pay as you go” payment models for each line of business (akin to what we now call PaaS).

member_experience_collection.title: Sales Manager
member_experience_collection.description: Qinec's Personalised Healthcare Management (PHM) platform is designed to provide complete control of your patient journey, from initial referral through to outcome. Our platform helps you seamlessly connect care professionals and enhance your capability at every stage of the journey. For the patient this means a more personal, convenient service, a faster journey and best possible outcome. From the moment a referral or enquiry comes onto the system, Qinec tracks real-time data, taking appropriate action based on how each patient's personal details fit workflow rules defined entirely by providers. Interaction with patients is enhanced by eliminating administration for providers and making outcomes easy to log and monitor in our colabrative medical record (CMR). Qinec gives providers complete control over clinical and administrative workflows. This means you can focus on delivering innovative, flexible and personalised care; at lower cost and greater scale.

member_experience_collection.title: Healthcare Account Manager
member_experience_collection.description: Recruited to this market leading Healthcare Content Management technology provider to drive sales through strategic business development and the introduction of additional lines of business in to existing accounts. member_experience_collection.title: Founder & Chief Growth Officer - IBM Pathway Signal Management
member_experience_collection.description:
IBM Pathway Signal Management is for integrated care systems and hospital providers with complex care pathways who need to improve their referral to treatment times and corresponding patient outcomes, but are unable to hire additional clinical staff due to budget, candidate availability and/or have high locum expenditure. It is thus ideally suited to the climate in the NHS, especially with the treatment backlogs and workforce pressures resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic

In the role of CGO, I plan and execute every aspect of the business units growth, acquisition and retention strategy.   This includes market category, product and company design, offering management, business development, sales, consulting, delivery and client success.

member_projects_collection.name: HCA Implements Perceptive VNA
member_projects_collection.description: HCA, the private healthcare provider, has completed the first stage of implementing a vendor neutral archive from Perceptive. The provider, which has hospitals in London and Manchester, already has a single instance picture archiving and communications system, which enables clinicians on different sites to see radiology images, but it wanted to have a single archive to hold images from different disciplines. Kaye Bonython, head of imaging informatics at HCA, said: “We wanted to be able to bring all imaging under one management type, as we add things like cardiovascular work and non-DICOM image management like medical photography and ultimately digital pathology.

member_projects_collection.name: Improving Paitent Care & Avoiding Lost Revenue at Nottingham University Hospital
member_projects_collection.description: Find out how Nottingham University Hospitals (NUH) NHS Trust leveraged EMC and Cisco technologies to power the transformation of its radiotherapy department. As a result, NUH achieved impressive cost savings, flexibility, and resilience while enabling radiotherapy staff to spend more time with patients and develop their practices.

data_emp.name: Julian van Santen
data_emp.title:
CTO, Enterprise Risk, Legal and Audit Technology.

Experimental Aircraft builder and Pilot.
data_emp.summary:
Julian van Santen leads the enterprise technology for Risk, Audit and Legal at Wells Fargo Bank.

Julian started with the company in 2005; previously he was Director of Legal and Compliance technology for Credit Suisse.

Julian has ten years of investment banking experience, starting at Paribas in 1996 working on software development projects in Equity Sales and Investment Banking, located in London.  He became a Security and Futures Authority registered representitive in 1998 and worked on the Credit Suisse Equity Capital Markets Syndicate desk.  In 2000 he moved to Palo Alto, California where he was responsible Technology Banking information technology and West Coast development and support.

Julian graduated from Southampton University, England where he earned an Upper Second Honors degree in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering.

Specialties: anti-money laundering, Banking Secrecy Act, OFAC, Transaction Monitoring, Operational Risk and Compliance, Basel II, Securities, contract negotiation and purchasing, talent management, Fed, OCC, SFA, Fraud

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
I had the opportunity to work with Julian first at Credit Suisse and then at Wells Fargo. In all of the projects I worked with him on at these two firms, I found him to be insightful and able to get to the crux of an issue or problem with very little information. He was able to focus his team on solving the right problem and do it quickly.

Also impressive for a senior executive was Julian’s ability to get into the technical details of a solution and force a technical team to articulate not only how they were going to solve a problem but also why. This allowed him to make sure the solution being proposed was the right one given the business environment and the constraints the team needed to manage within.

I was fortunate in working with Julian in this high-profile set of projects for HM Customs & Excise, shortly before the combination with Revenue. 
 The varied technology work environment made our work difficult, however Julian's rather expert IT knowledge and ability was of a great help to me and many others involved in the projects.

His personal support was of great value to me and I would have no hesitation in recommending him to anyone.  If he says he can do it, he will!!

Julian is an experienced SVP within the Compliance and Enterprise Risk Management area of Wells Fargo.  Thoroughly knowledgeable in his field and balanced in his judgements - I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him.  It was a pleasure working with him.

data_emp.name: Rich Miner
data_emp.title: Android Founder
data_emp.summary:
I have been building and investing in innovative startups for over 30 years. I joined Google with the acquisition of my startup company Android, which we built into the worlds most popular operating system. At Google I helped lead android development, helped create and grow our venture fund (GV) & I am currently building innovative products.  Before Google I helped build the worlds first voice based personal assistant as co-founder of Wildfire Communications. We sold Wildfire to Orange where I was a VP of innovation and also started Orange Venture's - a corporate fund focused on communications and life style related investments. I have a  doctorate in Computer Science from the University of Mass at Lowell.

Specialties: building, leading and motivating teams, delivering innovative products, raising money, architecture, telecommunications, speech recognition, user interfaces, internal and external communications, selling and closing deals, leading companies to successful exists

member_patents_collection.title: Network Based Knowledgeable Assistant
member_patents_collection.description: A method implemented by a computer-based electronic assistant to receive and manage incoming calls to a subscriber including the steps of receiving an incoming call to the subscriber from a caller; establishing a first connection between the electronic assistant and the caller; establishing a second connection between the electronic assistant and the subscriber; over the second connection, electronically notifying the subscriber of the incoming call; in response to receiving a call accept command from the subscriber over the second connection, linking the caller and the subscriber so that they may communicate with each other; upon linking the subscriber to the caller, switching the electronic assistant to a background mode in which said electronic assistant continues to monitor the subscriber over the second connection while the subscriber is linked with the caller; and in response to receiving a summoning command, switching the electronic assistant into a foreground mode

member_patents_collection.title: In-conversation search
member_patents_collection.description: The ability to bring an assistant into an ongoing text or voice discussion and having it conduct a search for you.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation: Rich Miner is truly one of the most incredible people I've worked with during my career.  He is not only smart and thoughtful - but he's an exceptional human being with a great sense of humor.  Working with Rich is a privilege - if you have a chance to work with Rich - just do it.

The words: disruptive, great leader, left field, rule breaker, people-oriented and intellectual heavy weight are as close as I can find to summarise Rich. Anyone who has worked with him or around him is inspired by both his ideas and energy.
