member_education_collection.title: University of Cambridge
member_education_collection.subtitle: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD), Technology & Innovation
member_education_collection.activities_and_societies: Activities and Societies: Committee member of EITIM DOC: The young research community of the European Institute of Technology and Innovation Management
member_education_collection.description:
Technology Management Tools: The Link to Business Context

Analysed methods and tools in strategic technology management, identified practical needs in managing technology, structured insights gathered from conducting interviews with senior technology managers, developed frameworks to guide managers in configuring methods and tools that suit their organisation.

Keltsch, J.-N., Probert, D.R. and Phaal, R. (2011), A process for configuring technology management tools, International Journal of Technology Intelligence and Planning, 7(3), pp. 181-200

Keltsch, Probert, Phaal (2011) A Process for Configuring Technology Management Tools, ISPIM Conference 2011, Hamburg, Germany

Keltsch, Phaal, Probert (2010) Matrix Tools in Strategic Technology Management: Structure and Configuration, PICMET 2010, Bangkok, Thailand

Keltsch, Phaal, Probert (2009) Towards the Link between Technology and Business: A Proposed Business Model Framework, PICMET 2009, Portland, OR, U.S.A

member_education_collection.title: University of St Andrews
member_education_collection.subtitle: MSc., International Strategy and Economics, First Class Honours
member_education_collection.description:
Thesis: Application of Game Theory to the Privatisation Process of the Mexican Oil Industry

Joint research project with fellow Mexican student with law background, involving on-site research in Mexico City to conduct interviews with politicians, diplomats and Oil & Gas industry managers

Courses:
• Thinking Strategically
• International Economy
• Methods and Models in Economics
• Growth and Economic Development
• International Entrepreneurship
• Economics of Negotiations

member_experience_collection.title: CEO and Founder
member_experience_collection.description:
Embella developed a new product for the fem care consumer market and professional applications. The product was launched nationwide in Germany and achieved listings in over 4.500 stores across Germany

• Invented the product and founded the company, running the business
• Executed the market launch
• Presented the business before investors and secured substantial funding
• Developed the product incl. drafting, filing and prosecuting seven DE, EP and WO patents
• Setting up the production capability and capacity in Europe and South East Asia
• Conducting qualitative and quantitative market research studies

member_experience_collection.title: CEO & Managing Partner
member_experience_collection.description:
• Head of the six person investment team
• Managing the portfolio of five holding companies including P&L and KPI monitoring, co-develop strategy from board position and budgeting leading to one exit, one exit pre-phase and one pivot
• Interims C-Level management function within a multi-national portfolio company to pivot the business (cleaning up accounting, lay-offs, change of control under company law)
• Defining and managing the dealflow process from identifying approx. 20 potential targets per week to term sheet negotiations and due diligence. Identified five targets with an accumulated valuation of approx. €25m
• Pitching the opportunity of Digital Health startup investments to potential LPs
• Represented XLHealth at various international conferences as speaker

member_experience_collection.title: Solutions Architect
member_experience_collection.description:
• Architected, Developed and Deployed dynamically scalable, highly available, fault tolerant, and reliable applications in AWS.
• Migrated multi-tier and complex legacy applications to AWS based on security, database, data, and compute requirements.
• Implemented cost control strategies with AWS.
• Experience in scripting, deploying and managing AWS deployments for both Linux and Windows Stacks.
• Experience in developing and deploying CI/CD deployments and in developing disaster recovery scenarios.
• Defined and executed Migration strategy to move application to cloud and developed architecture blueprints and detailed documentation and leveraged appropriate AWS services and validated the environment to meet all security and compliance controls.
• Designed the overall Virtual Private Cloud - VPC environment including server instance, storage instances, subnets, availability zones, etc.

member_experience_collection.title: Software Engineer Lead
member_experience_collection.description:
• Rapid-provisioning, designed and architected Resume Finder Component through which over a million candidates will be sent through the cloud infrastructure every week, and ultimately passed downstream to SFDC using CloudFormation and Chef on Amazon Web Services. Implemented Chef best-practices and wrote cookbooks and roles for several components for Resume Finder work flow. Proposed, architected and developed Jersey RESTful service framework for Business functions and provided team a standard methodology for using it effectively. Expertise with the Barracuda Web Application Firewall and BCL PDF converter including scripting its installation and configuration in AWS.
• Lead Engineer for all Resume Finder downstream functions for Drupal Websites Migration project and also managed production deployments in terms of software deliveries and overnight activates for Job applies and Resume uploads. Coordinated with internal and external Client resources to isolate and troubleshoot issues that caused service disruption and outage. Managed excellent relationships with IT Operations and business partners to optimize application performance and results.
• Lead Server Side SOA tasks for Candidate Registration project by focusing on conceptualizing business needs and translating them into viable technical solutions. Passionately worked with team members to overhaul and launch registration site. Implemented server side updates required by GWT and added improvements to performances of all new endpoints that serve the registration site.

member_experience_collection.title: Software Engineer
member_experience_collection.description:
• Architected and implemented batch interfaces for Micro J Canada project by participating in all phases of software development lifecycle - analysis, design, technical specification, database architecture, programming, testing, maintenance and support. Assumed progressive roles and responsibilities throughout.
• Lead developer for Job Postings Outbox Web service to be in line with cross team strategy and highly conscientious about the quality of work and to deliver good product. Provided technical leadership and direction to cross functional teams, also responsible for enhancing the Web Job Posting Extracts Processing System for Canadian Job Boards.
• Worked with Technical Support Center for Onyx support to ensure effective assistance for all tasks for over a year and maintained the highest possible standards in fixing all the issues. Been flexible on changing directions when presented. Trained new employees and provided guidance when required. Supported team members on call and in production releases to reach full potential and demonstrated an excellent example of how cooperation can yield results.

member_recommendations_collection.recommendation:
Aishwarya's profile speaks for itself! I had the pleasure of working with Aishwarya for more than a year, on an application wherein AWS was being implemented for the first time. I was new & the only QA resource on the project. The project had an aggressive timeline & entailed a steep learning curve for everyone on the team. Aishwarya was responsible for delivering some critical components of the application. She did an outstanding job of delivering high-quality code. She also provided excellent support to the QA team whenever required. Her responses were timely & she shared a lot of technical details that enabled me to gain an extremely good understanding of the application & do a good job of testing it thoroughly.

She is extremely proactive, responsible, result-oriented & technically very sound that makes her a great asset to any employer. Her friendly demeanor and calm temperament make it easy for anyone to work with her & build great rapport. 

I loved working with Aishwarya & I would highly recommend her!
